name: The red planet (Karljakob)
description: Move with a and d. Jump with the spacebar. In this game you have to run away from the lava. You can get 4 Endings. One Ending is a secret. To download the game on Windowns you have to download the pck and the exe file. If you have both open the exe file to start the game. On mac you have to download the dmg an  then open it. Inside of he dmg is the game. Open ithe game to play it.
